title: Full house 3 bedroom 2 bath in perfect area of nj
posting_body: ['3-bedroom 2 bath located in the heart of tri-state area.', 'Features open concept layout, cozy and convenient setup, with a full basement, garage, patio, and backyard.', 'House comes with hardwood floors, sensi thermostat, dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, washer/dryer, central A/C and heat, and more.', 'The house is located adjacent to a playground/basketball court, with a recreation center and town pool right down the street.', 'Inquire within as this listing will not last.', "Besides being a commuter's dream, Secaucus (located within 10 minutes of midtown Manhattan and 3 minutes from the American Dream Mall) has raised its standards to becoming one of the top 10 places to live in NJ being recognized as a safe haven from the congestion of the city.", 'With restaurants, shopping centers, great schools, parks, and activities at every turn, the town of Secaucus is a great place to live for the whole family.', 'Rent is 3250 with month and a half security required.', 'Call Lina for more info and available showing at (862) 600-5242']
